long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a developer or a  student who makes lots of notes and bookmarks? If yes then this Extension is going to save your time. How do you generally make bookmarks. 
Bookmark the page on chrome? 
         or
Save the important information of a website on your memo.
In first case it becomes very difficult to search for a specific section from a page and it is very difficult to manage bookmarks as the size grows.
If you are copy pasting the notes on a memo then you are doing really very hard work .

Presenting to you Bookmark Store a Chrome extension that let you manage your bookmarks easily and in just a click.

Steps:-
* Download the extension
* Click the extension and Sign up
* Now select the text , right click and add to bookmark store
* Your content along with title and web url will be saved there
* Click the extension again to view your bookmarks

Features:-
* Easy to use
* See and add bookmarks from both PC and Mobile
* Filter the bookmarks based on title/url/topic
